title: 2008 Australian Grand Prix
summary: The 2008 Australian Grand Prix (officially known as the 2008 Formula 1 ING Australian Grand Prix)[3] was a Formula One motor race held on 16 March 2008 at the Melbourne Grand Prix Circuit, Melbourne, Australia. It was the firstÂ race of the 2008 Formula One season. In qualifying for the event, Lewis Hamilton for the McLaren team started from pole position ahead of Robert Kubica in the BMW Sauber by 0.15 seconds.
